name: Birthcohort
title: Birth cohort
description: Month and year of infant's birth, which the infant is registered into. The cohort is a group of infants born in the same month, whose status is followed over time.

mapping.name: Digital Adaptation Kit for Antenatal Care

element.definition: Month and year of infant's birth, which the infant is registered into. The cohort is a group of infants born in the same month, whose status is followed over time.
element.comment: Data type may vary by country and context but often will include month and year
